supply.v: Harvest delayed by stormsss. Estimated completion 65%.
Rains in Minas Gerais improved soil moisture.

demand.v: Coverage thin for Q1 2026. Spot demand increasing.
Green coffee stocks at ports fell to 5.8m bags.

stocks.v: Cert stocks stable at low levels.

futures.v: Non-commercials reduced net long by 2k lots.
